title: Can Tim Ryan Pull Off the Biggest Upset of the Midterms in Ohio?
description: The Democrats are doing almost exactly what he said they should to save their political fortunes in the Midwest. But is it enough to win Ohio?
dc:creator: Alec MacGillis
media:credit: Megan Jelinger for The New York Times
media:description: Tim Ryan, the Democratic Senate nominee in Ohio, in Columbus this month. As manufacturing has declined in the state, so have Democratic fortunes.
